attributes.action: allow the subjects of the United Kingdom to recast their votes from the 2005 General Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the basis that this government intends to make changes to the law which will have a retroactive impact on the pension entitlement of Sir Fred Goodwin, we the undersigned believe that the same principle should be applied to the 2005 General Election results.  It is clear, that with the benefit of hindsight, we would not have elected a Labour government in 2005; therefore we demand the right to remove the government via an amendment to constitutional law, which will allow UK citizens to reconsider their vote.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
